topComments.author: Jeri Lynn Vizzi
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu gravei uma sess√£o de maternidade l√° outro dia e √© absolutamente lindo! Mam√£e estava bem avan√ßada, ent√£o n√£o percorremos todo o caminho pelos jardins. Tenho que guardar isso para outro dia. O que vimos foi lindo e total primavera. Fomos cedo porque sab√≠amos que ia esquentar r√°pido e est√°vamos certos. √â um lugar lindo para passear. Muito tranquilo, lindas cores de flores e borboletas! BTW, para fot√≥grafos, voc√™ precisa ligar para eles se for fazer uma sess√£o de fotos com adere√ßos ou equipamentos. Eles estavam bem conosco indo apenas com a c√¢mera e filmando ao longo do nosso caminho.  (Original) I shot a maternity session there the other day and it is absolutely beautiful! Mom was pretty far along so we didn‚Äôt go all the way through the gardens. I have to save that for another day. What we did see was gorgeous and total spring time. We went early because we knew it would get hot fast and we were right. It‚Äôs a beautiful place to stroll through. Very peaceful, beautiful flower colors and butterflies! BTW, for photographers, you have to call them if you‚Äôre going to do a photo shoot with any props or gear. They were fine with us going with just the camera and shooting along our way.

topComments.author: Alan Foxman
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Os pr√≥prios jardins s√£o muito bons. Mas eu tenho que ser honesto que a localiza√ß√£o custa algumas estrelas. Cercado por est√∫dios de tatuagem e clubes de strip (que provavelmente n√£o existiam originalmente quando os jardins foram estabelecidos) e, o mais irritante, fica literalmente do outro lado da rua do Aeroporto Internacional de Palm Beach. Consequentemente, a tranquilidade dos jardins √© interrompida a cada poucos minutos por um pouso de jato. Eles tamb√©m poderiam se beneficiar por ter mais distin√ß√£o entre os diferentes tipos de jardins. Quero dizer, √© √≥bvio quando voc√™ muda para a horta ou jardim zen, mas menos quando passa de um jardim de rosas para outro. No geral, um agrad√°vel 2 horas e eu recomendo cautelosamente uma visita. Tente focar na beleza dos jardins e n√£o nos arredores. (Observe que quando fomos, 30/12/21, a entrada da frente estava passando por reformas, ent√£o voc√™ tem que usar uma entrada lateral. Mas eu n√£o estou tirando nada para isso. Isso mostra que eles querem manter o lugar em bom estado doen√ßa).  (Original) The gardens themselves are very nice. But I have to be honest that the location costs it a couple of stars. Surrounded by tattoo parlors and strip clubs (which I assume probably weren't there originally when the gardens were first established) and, most annoyingly, it's literally across the street from Palm Beach International Airport. Consequently, the peacefulness of the gardens is disrupted every few minutes by a jet landing. They could also benefit from having more of a distinction between the different garden types. I mean it's obvious when you move into the vegetable garden or the zen garden but less so when moving from like the rose garden into one of the others. Overall a pleasant 2 hours and I do cautiously recommend a visit. Just try to focus on the beauty of the gardens and not the surroundings. (Note that when we went, 12/30/21, the front entrance was undergoing renovations so you have to use a side entrance. I'm not taking anything off for that though. It shows that they want to keep the place in good condition).

topComments.author: Leah Sapphira

The Lego installation is fantastic for kids and adults alike with tons of information about each piece. We will be back! *Bring plenty of water and sensible shoes for walking*

topComments.author: Benjamin Eschenbach

No geral, uma experi√™ncia de 2 horas + se voc√™ tomar seu tempo e aproveitar tudo o que o jardim tem a oferecer. Eles tamb√©m vendem as plantas por um pre√ßo razo√°vel. Prefiro comprar aqui do que Home Depot. Certamente podemos nos perder em sua beleza. Foi bom ficar longe da √°rea urbana pela primeira vez.  (Original) 5/5 stars. Had an enjoyable time here. Weather was perfect for an outside visit. Overall, a 2 + hour experience if you take your time and enjoy everything the garden has to offer. They also sell plants themselves at a reasonable price. I‚Äôd rather buy here than Home Depot. One can certainly get lost in its beauty. Nice getting away from the urban area for once.

topComments.author: Michael Sharon
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Uau! O Nature POP de Sean Kenney foi maravilhoso! Foi a nossa primeira visita ao Jardim Bot√¢nico de Montes e definitivamente valeu a pena. A arte da Lego era fabulosa‚Ä¶ disposta ao redor do terreno t√£o perfeitamente‚Ä¶ meu filho mal podia esperar para ver o que havia em cada caminho! Uma maneira maravilhosa de desfrutar dos jardins e apreciar a natureza para crian√ßas e adultos!  (Original) Wow! The Sean Kenney‚Äôs Nature POP was wonderful! It was our first visit to Mounts Botanical Garden and definitely worth it. The Lego art was fabulous‚Ä¶ laid out around the grounds so perfectly‚Ä¶ my son couldn‚Äôt wait to see what was down each path! A wonderful way to enjoy the gardens and appreciate nature for a child and adults!

topComments.author: Christian Godoy
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Que surpresa agrad√°vel! Um jardim inesperado em um local improv√°vel em frente ao aeroporto. Este era um jardim muito bom e tinha um √≥timo centro de jardim com pre√ßos muito bons para as plantas. Muito bem conservado e grande variedade de plantas e √°rvores.  (Original) What a pleasant surprise! An unexpected garden in an unlikely location across from the airport. This was a really nice garden and had a great garden center with very good prices for plants. Very nicely maintained and great selection of plants and trees.

topComments.author: Julian Mathews
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) MBG √© uma verdadeira j√≥ia para os amantes de plantas da Fl√≥rida (e visitantes, √© claro) que gostam de passear por ambientes bot√¢nicos bem cuidados, mas n√£o bem cuidados. √Årvores, arbustos e flores abundam com muitos p√°ssaros e insetos tamb√©m apreciando a √°rea. A partir desta revis√£o, h√° uma exposi√ß√£o de Lego Sculpture nos jardins at√© maio; a n√£o perder! Ao longo do ano, s√£o realizados regularmente eventos e passeios nos quais os membros recebem entradas inclusivas ou com pre√ßos favor√°veis, incluindo duas vendas de plantas por ano para os interessados ‚Äã‚Äãem aumentar seus pr√≥prios jardins. O aeroporto, PBI, fica bem perto e o barulho dos avi√µes indo e vindo pode ser uma surpresa para os visitantes de primeira viagem, mas se isso o desencoraja, voc√™ provavelmente n√£o iria l√° de qualquer maneira, ent√£o sua perda. Coloque Mount's na sua lista de locais Zen para visitar. √â positivamente bonito.  (Original) MBG is a real gem for Florida plant lovers (and visitors, of course) who enjoy a stroll through well-kept, but not manicured, botanical environments. Trees, shrubs and flowers abound with many birds and insects also enjoying the area. As of this review, there is a Lego Sculpture exhibition throughout the gardens until May; not to be missed! Throughout the year, events and tours are held regularly to which members receive inclusive or favorably priced entry, including two plant sales per year for those interested in adding to their own gardens. The airport, PBI, is quite close by and the roar from aircraft coming and going can be a bit of a surprise to first-time visitors, but if that puts you off, you probably wouldn't go there anyway so your loss. Put Mount's on your list of Zen spots to visit. It's positively beautiful.

topComments.author: Dominique Norbeck-Amos
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um dia perfeito. Desfrute sempre de visitas, eventos e workshops aqui. Seu ber√ß√°rio √© sempre √≥timo para comprar e apoiar. Eu n√£o teria um casamento aqui por causa do barulho do aeroporto.  (Original) A perfect day out. Always enjoy visits, events and workshops here. Their nursery is always great to shop and support. topComments.author: Theo

Muitos bancos agrad√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãpara ver a beleza natural e um viveiro para pegar as plantas que voc√™ gostaria de levar para casa! Os avi√µes que sobrevoam s√£o uma caracter√≠stica, n√£o um bug, est√° localizado ao lado do aeroporto, afinal!  (Original) Beautiful garden with lots to see. Plenty of nice benches to view the natural beauty and a nursery to pick up any plants you might like to bring home! The planes flying overhead are a feature, not a bug, it's located adjacent to the airport after all!

topComments.author: Shane Collins
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Decidimos parar nos jardins hoje, j√° que tivemos um √≥timo clima. Verificamos o site antes de chegarmos e vimos que os ingressos custavam US$ 12 por adulto, o que foi ok. Uma vez que chegamos l√°, o tix agora custa $ 15 porque h√° um evento especial acontecendo com est√°tuas de Lego pelos jardins. Teria sido bom se fosse postado claramente na p√°gina inicial do site que os pre√ßos dos ingressos aumentaram devido ao evento especial, e n√£o apenas um asterisco que diz que os pre√ßos podem aumentar. Isso n√£o lhe d√° ideia de quando esperar pre√ßos mais altos at√© ser surpreendido na entrada da frente. Al√©m disso, havia uma parte do jardim, a Floresta Tropical, que foi fechada para reformas. Tamb√©m n√£o havia nada que eu pudesse encontrar no site informando que uma se√ß√£o estava fechada para reformas. Eles tamb√©m mostram que t√™m uma cachoeira em suas fotos, e a cachoeira n√£o estava funcionando ou simplesmente n√£o estava ligada. N√£o tenho certeza de qual, pois n√£o havia sinais para indicar por que n√£o estava ligado. Os jardins eram bonitos, mas pelo tamanho geral do jardim e por ter uma se√ß√£o fechada para reformas, definitivamente n√£o vale US $ 15 por ingresso. Sentiu-se um pouco enganador ao permitir que as pessoas pagassem esses pre√ßos e n√£o fossem adiantadas que existem algumas √°reas nos jardins que n√£o est√£o dispon√≠veis para ver e desfrutar.  (Original) Decided to stop by the gardens today since we had great weather. Checked the website before we came and saw tickets were $12 per adult, which was ok. Once we got there, tix are now $15 because there is a special event going on with Lego statues throughout the gardens. Would have been nice if it was posted clearly on the website homepage that ticket prices had increased due to the special event, and not just have an asterisk that says prices can increase. That gives you no idea when to expect higher prices until you‚Äôre surprised at the front entrance. Also, there was a section of the garden, the Tropical Forest, that was closed for renovations. There was also nothing I could find on the website stating that a section was closed for renovations. They also show that they have a waterfall in their photos, and the waterfall either wasn‚Äôt working or just wasn‚Äôt on. Not sure which one as there were no signs to indicate why it wasn‚Äôt on. The gardens were pretty, but for the overall size of the garden and having a section closed for renovations, it definitely is not worth $15 a ticket. Felt a little deceptive on their end allowing people to pay these prices and not be upfront that there are some areas in the gardens that are not available to see and enjoy.

topComments.author: Beth Williams
topComments.comment: Mounts Botanical Garden is a botanical garden in West Palm Beach, Florida. It is a lovely venue, open to the public, and for me, is a source of continuing pleasure and learning.  The Mounts is an important part of our community, and all are welcome to attend its programs and events, learn more about plants and gardening through the activities and groups that meet there, and enjoy the beauty of the grounds.  The Mounts is Palm Beach County's largest and oldest public garden. The grounds are lush with more than 2,000 species of tropical and subtropical plants from six continents.  Many of the plants here are native to Florida, and include exotic trees, tropical fruits, herbs, citrus and palms.  In February 2022, I met up with three friends to enjoy the Nature POP! exhibition, which featured over 40 sculptures by Sean Kenney. These incredible sculptures were created from over 800,000 LEGO pieces!  The sculptures, whether placed as focal points around the gardens, or grouped in exhibits as if part of the natural ecosystem, explored the beauty of nature and subtly expressed the artist‚Äôs thoughts on the relationships that exist in nature.  The individual sculptures and groupings variously expressed, for example, the delicate balances between predators and their prey. Or as another example, the commonalities among species as they care for and nurture their young.  Running throughout the exhibition was a silent commentary regarding the effect that we humans have on the natural world.  The artist , Mr. Kenney, effectively communicated his message through the highly-stylized and colorful displays. The bold, vivid LEGO sculptures standing in striking contrast with their surroundings underscored this message.  I appreciated how Nature POP!, which was produced by Image Exhibitions, blended artistic innovation and science in the artist‚Äôs newest sculptures.  Mounts is a component of the Palm Beach County Cooperative Extension Service and is affiliated with the University of Florida / IFAS.

Uma maravilhosa mistura de arte, escultura e gemas bot√¢nicas, √© um espet√°culo a n√£o perder.  (Original) Just a stone's throw from PBI Airport  the Mounts  Botanical Garden provides a wonderful outdoor get away for a quick connection with nature. A wonderful mixture of art, sculpture and Botanical gems, it is a sight not to be missed.
